thread.title: Souad Faress May Play High Priestess on 'Game of Thrones'
thread.title_full: Souad Faress May Play High Priestess on 'Game of Thrones'

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Souad Faress May Play High Priestess on 'Game of Thrones'
text:
Comments The actress' newly updated CV reveals that she 'is currently filming in HBO's 'Game of Thrones' as the High Priestess.' 
When it was first reported in August that Souad Faress was cast for " Game of Thrones " season 6, it wasn't immediately known which character she would tackle. New tidbit from the show has now revealed her possible role on the hit HBO series. According to her newly updated Spotlight CV , the actress "is currently filming the role of High Priestess in HBO's 'Game of Thrones'." It's unclear though which god she serves. It's recently revealed that the show would feature a new Red Priestess, played by Melanie Liburd, besides Melisandre ( Carice van Houten ). Other new additions for the upcoming season include Pilou Asbaek as Theon's uncle Euron Greyjoy, Max von Sydow as the Three-Eyed Raven, as well as Ian McShane and Richard E. Grant. "Game of Thrones" will air in spring 2016.
